placard.para: Placard appropriate switch "VALVE INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

warning.para: ENSURE PERSONNEL AND EQUIPMENT ARE CLEAR OF ALL CONTROL SURFACES TO PREVENT INJURY OR DAMAGE.

numlitem.para: Verify valve(s) is open by pressurizing the appropriate hydraulic system and displacing the control column while observing elevator deflection on EICAS.
